data.title: Enjoyable way to spend a EVENING
data.text: We have been to 7 shows here in the past few years and have always enjoyed the the entertainment.  The shows are well done and the it is nice to have a place like this in the east end of the valley.  We go every chance we get and have had a very good time at every show.

data.title: Professional Theatre Performances
data.text: This is a wonderful Performing Arts Center located in the historic Old Towne Indio..They have facilities that are rented out for events and also 4 different stages where live performances are held. We saw a wonderful company "Palm Desert Stage Company" performing a live radio show of It's A Wonderful Life...Very professional actors and beautiful holiday setting...very friendly staff and the seating was very comfortable (movie theatre seats)..we'll be back.!
